title: Chip sector shifts: Nvidia to beat Apple as TSMC's top customer
full_text: Chip sector shifts: Nvidia to beat Apple as TSMC's top customer. Nvidia (NVDA) is set to surpass Apple (AAPL) as Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company's (TSM) top 2026 customer.Creative Strategies CEO and principal.... Nvidia is shaping up to surpass Apple as Taiwan Semiconductor's top customer in 2026, a shift that could reshape the chip sector for more we're bringing in now. Ben Bajarin, CEO and principal analy… [+3525 chars]
